SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into contract_attachment (company_id, contract_id, name, content_type, size, path, type, staff_id, staff_name, cst_create, cst_modified, is_del ) values (#{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{contractId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{size,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{staffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now(), false )
mapper.update: update contract_attachment set company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, contract_id = #{contractId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content_type = #{contentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, size = #{size,jdbcType=BIGINT}, path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, staff_id = #{staffId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, staff_name = #{staffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cst_create = #{cstCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cst_modified = #{cstModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_del = #{del,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update contract_attachment set cst_modified = now(), is_del = true where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and is_del=false
mapper.select: select id, company_id, contract_id, name, content_type, size, path, type, staff_id, staff_name, cst_create, cst_modified, is_del from contract_attachment where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, company_id, contract_id, name, content_type, size, path, type, staff_id, staff_name, cst_create, cst_modified, is_del from contract_attachment

select id, company_id, contract_id, name, content_type, size, path, type, staff_id, staff_name, cst_create, cst_modified, is_del from contract_attachment where contract_id=#{contractId, jdbcType=BIGINT} and is_del=false
